name: @felix-kyun/file-router
description: Minimal File and Decorator based route configurator for express.
author: Felix Kyun

scripts.build: bun build:esm && bun build:cjs && bun build:types
scripts.build:esm: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/esm --format esm --target node --sourcemap=external
scripts.build:cjs: bun build src/index.ts --outdir dist/cjs --format cjs --target node --outfile index.js --sourcemap=external
